document.full_text: johnson & johnson said on thursday it is recalling about 57,000 bottles of its topamax epilepsy drug after reports of a foul odor, the latest in a string of recalls by the company.
document.title: j&j recalls 57,000 bottles of epilepsy drug
lines_and_colors: johnson & johnson said on thursday it is recalling about 57,000 bottles of its topamax epilepsy drug after reports of a foul odor, the latest in a string of recalls by the company.
